content: “Here’s how many people could die if Trumpcare becomes law” “By 2026, the number of people killed by Trumpcare could grow to approximately 29,000 in that year alone.” “Fourteen million divided by 830 equals 16,867 people potentially sentenced to die by Trumpcare.” “Sentenced to die”? “Killed by Trumpcare”? This is definitely an article you’ll want to bookmark for future amusement.
